definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish the method of determination of tauroursodeoxycholic acid in bear biliary drainage powder.
sentences.chinese: 建立熊膽粉中牛磺熊去氧膽酸的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Ursodexcholis acid(UDCA), the primary chemical component of bear bile, has widely pharmacological value.
sentences.chinese: 熊膽具有廣泛的藥理作用及應用價值。

sentences.english: Its healing properties have been recognized in Western medicine as well.
sentences.chinese: 熊膽的療效也得到了西方醫學的承認。

sentences.english: 'No one's going to die for the lack of bear bile,' she said in a telephone interview.
sentences.chinese: 她在接受電話採訪時說，沒有人會因爲缺乏熊膽而死。

sentences.english: Accordingly, hare bravery already became ursine bravery substitute.
sentences.chinese: 因此，兔膽已成爲熊膽替代品。
